physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a valley in Chumba
 Punjab. There are several levelled hill-tops in the valley
 with narrow paths snaking through. In the foreground of the photograph
 there is a man on a small path. He is wearing a white headpiece and black attire
 holding a walking stick in his right hand. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

In the foreground of the photograph, there is a man on a small path. He is wearing a white headpiece and black attire, holding a walking stick in his right hand. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
